item.title: Introductions, Reproducible Research, (a little) R, and (a little) Git
item.description: Todayâ€™s Agenda Introduce the course Introduce the concepts of Reproducible Research Introduce Git Introduce R as the (main) platform for the course Homework 1 Course Learning Objectives R programming Reproducible research concepts Good programming practices Data cleaning and munging Git fundamentals Markdown Python basics SAS basics Tentative Course Lecture Schedule Due dates are solid, however, feel free to race ahead. https://rsettlage.github.io/STAT_5014_Fall_2020/schedule/
